snippet.title: DRAGON BALL Xenoverse 2 - FUTURE SAGA Chapter 2 - Goku (Mini) Trailer
snippet.description:
Goku (Mini) from Dragon Ball DAIMA will be joining the fight in the DRAGON BALL Xenoverse 2 - FUTURE SAGA Chapter 2 DLC! A free trial campaign for Goku (Mini) will be held for a limited period. Grab the Power Pole and go on a rampage!

Follow Dragon Ball Games:
X: https://twitter.com/dragonballgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dragonballgames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DBZ.videogamesUS/

#dragonball #daima #DBXV2
